showerReviews.reviewText: Honestly after seeing some negative comments on the showers, we were hesitant to stop at this location. Thankfully, we had a great experience! While the truck parking was completely full, we did get to snag a temporary parking area to come ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ NO HOT WATER IN SHOWERS ‚Ä¶

04-09-25
The store is in the process of renovating. New showers. Unfortunately, the cheap shower heads spoil so much efforts of renovating them.
Beaten up driveways. Outdated pump equipment, but always friendly customer service! ü§† ‚Ä¶

It‚Äôs a Love‚Äôs. Parking here can fill quickly. I usually park across the road at the road ranger and walk over to Love‚Äôs to use my free showers. There‚Äôs a sidewalk that connects the truck stops. It gets me a bit of exercise to walk briskly ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of loves workers are just lazy and that's sad because the bathrooms look updated. I come into my shower nothing but hair on the sink floor and toilet. It doesn't even require much to just wipe and sanitize things for the next person. ‚Ä¶

HOT SHOWER!! I stopped at Loves #345 store to fuel, and the pump didn't work. I left there and came to this one, and everything was great. I'm not sure how there can be such a difference between different stores within the same chain

‚Ä¶ are my favorite travel stop when I'm out on the road I can get everything I need here including a hot shower propane clean windows with windshield washer fluid available and the folks here are so nice so kind and very hospitable love ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Diamond status every month. Loves is the only truckstop I fuel at. Pulled into this one today to get a quick shower and grab something to eat before I fuel and hit the road. I parked across from the cat scale in an open spot between 2 ‚Ä¶
Worst shower experience I‚Äôve ever had at a love I didn‚Äôt get to enjoy my shower it was barely warm to take a shower literally no hot water don‚Äôt ask for shower 4

Friendly Staff, Clean Showers, Fuel Pumps were clean & not busy, and parking was not a problem. I arrived 03/30/18 at 1915 and was parked & in my shower by 1930. The employees and the managers were all friendly and greeted me and they were ‚Ä¶

locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Pretty decent TA, very friendly staff, showers were clean and in good order. Their washing machines are a bit expensive. They have a nice TV room and a good shop. Decent amount of truck parking outed. I'd suggest getting here early by 2:00. It was 3/4 of the way full
David McleanLocal Guide ¬∑ 836 reviews ¬∑ 963 photos

Bad place, so we stopped on aug 24th. They had no showers for that day because they only had 1 person at counter and nobody available to clean showers. Besides the Manager. So I go to get a shower next morning and cannot because my shower ‚Ä¶

Dirty bathroom and empty toilet paper.  Got 1 slice of pizza for $3.99 and it was worst pizza I've ever had. Crust tasted like cardboard and pulling off the cheese and pepperoni still didn't improve it at all. Done with TA  and Petro. They ‚Ä¶

The worst TA I've ever seen, dirty bathrooms, trash everywhere, careless employees hanging at the cashier flirting with each other and vaping, I spent $1000 on diesel. at least I deserve clean truck stop, shame on you TA

locations.title: Petro Travel Center
locations.content: Petro Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: This place has plenty of showers but they are so gross! My shower had hair in the sink, lots of dark colored gunk on tiles, tp in the toilet and it was obvious nothing is cleaned between showers just restocked with towels. Showers have bad ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Same old Petro travel store you see anywhere, and showers that are outdated, but live able. ‚Ä¶

I enjoyed the shower. The Hot water remained hot for which I am grateful for given other truck stops. I was disappointed by the conditions of the shower. Cracked ceiling, and tiles. I imagine some sort of renovation is need asap.

They didn't have food at 9 a.m. and this is what the platinum shower looks like. Kind of curious what regular shower it looks like. I thought petro and ta had H"ospital level" cleanliness. If covid-19 was a shower room that's what it would ‚Ä¶

Big parking lot, fuel desk guy was nice. Shower are outdated , vents doesn't work so it feels like you are having a steam room, everything is wet, walls and floor. Also those little stairs hallway going to Petro tells you a lot how this ‚Ä¶

Paid $17 for a shower, got in bathroom and it was just disgusting, wasn‚Äôt clean at all and from the looks of it hasn‚Äôt been for a while, and there was no running water! The person that was cleaning bathrooms obviously wasn‚Äôt cleaning them, ‚Ä¶

I usually like parking here, but I don't think I'll be taking a shower here anymore.
The counter/sink was not cleaned, and they clearly didn't clean the shower since the used soap bar is still in there.

Would give the showers 0 stars if that was a possibility. Not the worst shower but in the top 5 considering I've been on the road since 91 that's an accomplishment.  They were semi clean but this place definitely needs an upgrade tiles ‚Ä¶
*I am a car driver and needed a place to shower, eat and rest over night, this place delivered!* ‚Ä¶
Seventeen bucks for a shower and you have to wait until the they them upstairs is in the mood to clean one, ask it how long and it gets very entitled and bitchy

locations.title: Iowa 80 - The World's Largest Truckstop
locations.content: Iowa 80 - The World's Largest Truckstop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ We spent the night in the RV lot after seeking shelter from dangerous winds & possible severe t-storms. We were able to do laundry & shower,  All very clean.  The laundry was very clean & reasonably priced... would definitely recommend! A ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ has many hidden amenities.  A great place for everyone but especially for truckers, and long haulers, as they have laundry and shower facilities as well as a dentist, barber, work out facilities and so much more! We love stopping on our ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ entertainment. There‚Äôs a huge convenience store for your snack needs and a diner that serves both menu items and a buffet. Didn‚Äôt get a shower there but the restrooms were clean. The place has 3 floors that includes a barber. There‚Äôs also ‚Ä¶

Pretty big with lots to do. Has a shower area. Tons of restaurants. Stuff for kids to explore and see. Has a chiropractor on site. This place has leveled up in the last few years by adding tons of stuff. ‚Ä¶

Hadn't been here in years. Went to take a shower on Palm Sunday and Pastor Daryl was giving a sermon in the lounge in front of the showers. The Lord told me to stay. Was warm & friendly service. Then I met with the pastor for 4 hours that ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of necessities and snacks. Spend some time wandering around the main store area, there's plenty to see. Clean restrooms and shower. Navigate through the various gift shops located throughout the facility. You can also get customized ‚Ä¶

World‚Äôs biggest truck stop. Besides truck parking which can park 900 trucks you have a restaurant, theatre, shower rooms, lounge, convince stores. Its is spread in 75 acres. If I am not wrong you can park here for free. It has fuel station ‚Ä¶

This place is huge. There‚Äôs a food court inside the truck stop. Upstairs there are dentist, chiropractor, shower, laundry, hair salon. And the truck section of stuff takes up half of the place. Parking was no problem. There‚Äôs also tesla ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ You can take a shower, get a haircut, and watch a movie. There's even a dentist and a chiropractor. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and friendly service here you can buy too much trick stuff from here lights bumper fittings hoses etc. little price higher Coustmer service very good here i love this location shower also very clean and too much like more than 25 may be

showerReviews.reviewText: Went here for my shower was Happy they are in the Pilot Network but was like  well Dang, you only get a dry off towel.. NO WASHCLOTH, NOR FOOT TOWELS.  MAKE SURE TO BRING YOUR OWN ..   Also while in the shower room getting out the shower ‚Ä¶
Forever wait for a shower cause they‚Äôre to lazy to clean one ‚Ä¶
The showerrooms up stairs are way to unbearably hot to shower in. On the other hand, the restaurant is good.
showerReviews.uniqueId: Kaleb Lippert (Saints and Angels Channel)_The_showerrooms_up_stairs_are_way_to_unbearably_ho_2 months ago

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ The place has anything and everything you can ever think or wish for. Open 24/7 its the one stop shop. Truckers heaven. Bathrooms, shower, restaurant, assorted truck stickers and such. Get everything you want!!!! Ill be back!!!!!! Enjoy!!!!

First time here but this a very nice truck. People are really friendly.  Great shower nice and hot. The only fault was restaurant needs to open a little bit longer. This place beats the pilot and love truck stops. Keep up the great work. I ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the service was alright. The store though? Nope. The cashiers were rude. I had purchased fuel & went back in after parking & waiting for the customer base to slow to get a shower. There are 2 of us, but we share shower rooms since it is my ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ restaurant is great. Parking is okay kind of disorganized. What really bumped them down on the stars is the early morning employees don't clean the showers and wouldn't sell me a shower when requested. He said I had to wait until 7:00 when ‚Ä¶

This place was clean, the linens were gorgeous and super comfy. The Roman shower was perfect for my needs. I was staying there because I was having a consult at the University of MN. I took 1 star off because I was surprised by the $27 ‚Ä¶

Do not take a shower here. You can't breathe because of all the chemicals. It was miserable. So many of us are chemically sensitive or allergic to things. There was no air conditioning or air circulation in th ed shower stall. We did get a ‚Ä¶
I really love this truckstop it‚Äôs really clean a lot of parking a lot of food good shower good  good customer service everything is so perfect ü§© ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Best truck stop i have ever been. Everyone so nice. Shower was shining. And most things are way more cheaper than any other place.
‚Ä¶ Shower ($11) very clean and roomy, at least #3 is. ‚Ä¶
Where to start? The outside of the building was clean the store area was clean the shower was clean. The Cafe was clean and good food. Everyone I spoke with were friendly and helpful
Nice place.  Shower clean.   Good restaurant.
Excellent service. Clean shower.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ not light up on the fleet card side. However, the professional driver area is nice! It has laundry, arcade with slots, a driver lounge and 3 showers ($11)! They give you a dollars worth of quarts you have to put in to start the shower ‚Ä¶

Went in for shower. Was told co worker cleaning showers. 30 mins later I walk back to showers. No one cleaning. I went back up front and when I asked about when will there be a clean shower I was told it didn‚Äôt matter cause they have no ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and walls) being sprayed 4 times before I was done due to the toilet spraying out. I would say restroom use should come with a free shower and laundry to clean up after, but other reviews sound like it wouldn't be much of an improvement. ‚Ä¶

Nice place, plenty parking for trucks. Odd thing was the shower, they give you 4 quarters and you get 25mins of water. The water is instantly hot and has good pressure though, the shower room is spacious as well. Nothin bad it just took me ‚Ä¶

Very nice truck stop. Decent parking. Though kinda of odd that they make you use quarters to use the shower due to being on well water. But the water quality is excellent and showers are very nice. Just put all quarters in first to use.

Mrs. Deana was a doll. Extremely nice facilities! Shower was the best.  Last for about 15 min then you have to deposit quarters.  Not to unusual. Been to a few TS's like that.  Will DEFINITELY  go back next time im in the area! Nice laundry ‚Ä¶

Always clean. But having to put quarters in a machine in the shower rooms to have hot water is rediculous. Even though they give you 4 quarters when you pay for your shower the idea of controlling the hot water is uncalled for.

I paid 11$ for a shower. They gave me 4 quarters that you put in the slot and yuo have 25min limited shower. Cabin 1 didn't have water pressure at all and the water was ice cold. Bad experience with these folks, the only reason why I didn't ‚Ä¶

locations.content: Road Ranger may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Spent a ten here, showers were the hottest I've ever had (into my 4th week solo as a driver) a bit on the smaller side but pressure was great. clerk was friendly and showers were 13 bucks. They give you an actual shower Mat instead of a ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ , ignoring the world.  I along with a couple other customers wandered across the street to Arby's.  Waited on friendly, fast, and reasonable prices, comparably.  This morning I took a shower, small, cramped, no counter, and not so clean. ‚Ä¶

I would like to thank and applaud the wonderful and kind woman (I'm sorry I did not get her name) at road ranger that allowed us to use their BEAUTIFUL shower after my 1 year old daughter got car sick all over herself. ‚Ä¶
The shower was tiny. Supposed to be handicapped, but there's no way anyone with a severe handicap would fit in the actual shower. The only restaurant was Subway and they were closed at supper time.
Very small, had a clean hot shower. There's a classic Wisconsin pub down the street (walking distance) & adult store across the st
I checked if they had a shower the lady was very rude mad not good probably yes awekup but the most pilot flying j are nice but this people no... no way bad place.
No hot water in shower and pubes in floor
